title: Larger labor force shifts PPC outward

content.question: Assume that an economy produces televisions and shoes. Which of the following would cause the production possibilities curve for this economy to shift outward?

choices.label: An increase in the labor force
An increase in the prices of both goods
An increase in the prices of resources used to produce both goods
A decrease in the demand for shoes
A change in consumersâ€™ tastes in favor of televisions

content.answer: An increase in the labor force
